## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                           | Type     | Default        |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------- |
| `direction`   | `direction`    | (optional) carousel display direction | `string` | `'horizontal'` |
| `totalSlides` | `total-slides` | carousel slider total number          | `number` | `undefined`    |
